data.name: KeyNotPresent
data.value: The current KeyInUse on this BatchAccountContext is the {0} key, but this key is not populated on the BatchAccountContext object. Use the Get-AzureRmBatchAccountKeys cmdlet to get a BatchAccountContext object with its keys populated.

data.value: No certificate data was specified. Supply the path to a certificate file, or provide the raw certificate data.

data.value: No compute node was specified. Supply a PSComputeNode object or a pool id and compute node id.

data.name: NoComputeNodeUser
data.value: No compute node user specified. Supply a pool id, compute node id, and compute node user name.

data.name: NoDownloadDestination
data.value: No destination was provided for the downloaded file. Either provide a file path or a Stream object.

data.name: NoJob
data.value: No job was specified. Supply a PSCloudJob object or a job id.

data.name: NoJobSchedule
data.value: No job schedule was specified. Supply a job schedule id or PSCloudJobSchedule object.

data.name: NoNodeFile
data.value: No node file was specified. Supply a PSNodeFile object or a node file name along with either a parent job id and task id, or a parent pool id and compute node id.

data.name: NoNodeFileParent
data.value: No node file parent information was specified. To specify a parent task, supply a PSCloudTask object or a job id and a task id. To specify a parent compute node, supply a PSComputeNode object or a pool id and a compute node id.

data.name: NoPool
data.value: No pool was specified. Supply a PSCloudPool object or a pool id.

data.name: NoTask
data.value: No task was specified. Supply a PSCloudTask object or a job id and task id.

data.name: ApplicationDoesNotAllowUpdates
data.value: Failed to create application package {0} version {1}. The package already exists, and the application does not allow existing packages to be updated. You must upload your package using a new version number.

data.name: FailedToCheckApplication
